name: Stranded (itch) (PlayouGames)
description:
Welcome to Stranded ! 

The objective is to collect logs around the island, once you have all four, you will be able to get on the rescue boat to safety.
There may be a surprise when you try to collect the logs, or get on the boat. Good Luck ! 
Press the ECAPE key to open the options. 
It is a point and click system to guide the character. 

I hope you enjoy this, as much as I did making it for my very first Game Jam.
